description: Nehuen is a vibrant market located in Mall√≠n Ahogado, Patagonia, showcasing a diverse range of products from local producers. It offers homemade and handmade goods, including craft beer, jams, medicinal herbs, and natural cosmetics. The initiative fosters a close relationship between producers and consumers, emphasizing agro-ecological practices and community engagement. Nehuen serves as a meeting point for neighbors and tourists, promoting sustainable local economies and cultural events while strengthening the bonds within the community.
name: Nehuen
